metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16976 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: Gitolite before 3.6.9 does not (in certain configurations involving @all ora regex) properly restrict access to a Git repository that is in theprocess of being migrated until the full set of migration steps has beencompleted. This can allow valid users to obtain unintended access.

criterions.comment: gitolite3 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
